original_text: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.
korean_text: 만일 서로 물고 먹으면 피차 멸망할까 조심하라

sentences.original_text: But if ye bite and devour one another
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 너희가 서로 물고 삼킨다면

sentences.original_text: that ye be not consumed one of another
